creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: brown, salmon-colored and blue-grey rock formations and mountains at top in background; boats on water at left, LLQ; grey bridge in LLC, with figure; trees and hut with round windows and figure inside, LRQ
inscription:
Inscription and Seal

ULQ, in black: untranslated inscription
markings: ULQ, in red: three seals; LRC, in red: one seal
title: Summer, from a four-piece set of "Landscapes of the Four Seasons"
